post.body: how can I become a judge??!!!
being nurturing to my three children
I know what you mean. Loved your comment about packing 4 the girls on your day off!! We would have 2 leave the country 4 day off
Yipee! The sun is out again!!!! And, my man is coming home 2day from a week long trip...
Saw Bolt w/ kids today. The miracle of going on a school night is u get the theater to yourself!! Kids loved it. Elise now wants a dog.
My son is trying to be coy...he touches something he is not supposed and looks at me...smirks and then moves his hand away. Ugh!
Have you seen this... http://chickswhoclick.com/ Looks like an awesome conference!
Today I am thankful for guardian angels in parking lots.
Love the weekends after the kids go to bed for the night...it's the best quiet time and me and my man can get some downtime!
Ready to get my mojo back...as in my life...as in myself...i need sleep, shopping and some kick ass workouts to get me back in line
Need 2 get my ho ho ho spirit back in full force...why might I add do I have more decos for xmas then normal decos???
I'm ready for the beach. Live in deep south and there is frost everywhere! What 'tha &%^! I moved from AK to get away from cold!
I find the manicure lawns in GA to be so blas√©...it just doesn't look natural!
Santa update....now I have celebrity status...I am on red carpet leading to Santa...kids left with Daddy Claus to playland...
We are in line waiting to see Santa! Wish us luck!! Currently my kids r being angels and as still fully dressed...
Best.day.ever! My 3yr old little girl is finally eating after years of not eating table/pureed foods...God is good!
